articles.title: DPRK's Delegation Leaves for Cuba
articles.content:
DPRK's Delegation Leaves for Cuba
Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Central Public Prosecutors Office of the DPRK headed by Director Kim Myong Gil left here for Cuba on Monday.

articles.title: Intellectuals of Merit Receive Birthday Spreads
articles.content:
Intellectuals of Merit Receive Birthday Spreads
Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un sent birthday spreads to Han Um Jon, a researcher at the Institute of International Studies, and Candidate Academician, Prof. and Dr. Ri Yong Su, a researcher at Wonsan University of Agriculture, on their 70th birthdays.
					 President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il ensured that Han Um Jon, who was born in an alien land in March Juche 37, 1948, came to the socialist homeland, and bestowed favors on Han.
					
					 Kim Jong Un has shown warm love tantamount to the one of the great leaders for Han, ensuring that Han works at a revolutionary post and inherits the tradition of the nation and patriotism.
					
					 Ri Yong Su has devoted his wisdom and passions to education and scientific research, contributing to the development of the country's agriculture and the training of talented agronomists.
					
					 While working as a teacher and a researcher for many years after his graduation from a university, he wrote dozens of kinds of textbooks and reference books and 100-odd scientific papers and trained many holders of academic degree.
					
					 Han and Ri were awarded commendations of the President and watches bearing his august name and had honor of participating in various significant meetings including the Sixth Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: National Meeting of Activists of Rural Youth Workteams and Sub-workteams Held
articles.content:
National Meeting of Activists of Rural Youth Workteams and Sub-workteams Held
Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- A national meeting of activists of rural youth workteams and sub-workteams took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday.
					 Present at the meeting were Ko In Ho, vice-premier and minister of Agriculture, Ri Il Hwan, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, officials of the youth league and activists in the movement of rural youth workteams and sub-workteams.
					
					 Pak Chol Min, first secretary of the C.C., Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League, in his report said that the movement of rural youth workteams and sub-workteams has developed into a powerful mass movement in the struggle to build an economic power and improve the people's living standard under the unfurled banner of the theses on the socialist rural question by the initiative and wise guidance of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Members of the rural youth workteams and subworkteams have fully demonstrated the heroic spirit and invincible might in agricultural production as youth vanguard, the reporter noted.
					
					 Referring to the fact that more than 1 400 youth workteams and subworkteams have become model, twice or thrice model youth workteams and subworkteams in the flames of the movement, the reporter stressed the need for all members of rural youth workteams and subworkteams to fully display the spirit of youth vanguard in a drive for implementing the theses on the socialist rural question.
					
					 Speakers at the meeting noted that the members of rural youth workteams and subworkteams across the country have grown into the core of the socialist countryside and into enthusiastic young revolutionaries through the struggle for implementing the Party's plan for socialist rural construction.
					
					 They analyzed and reviewed such faults of some rural youth workteams and subworkteams as failing to launch their movement in a revolutionary way in keeping with the Party's intention and the demand of the developing revolution and lessons from them.

articles.title: C.C. of UDKWJ Meets
articles.content:
C.C. of UDKWJ Meets
Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The 4th meeting of the 29th Central Committee of the Union of Democratic Korean Women in Japan (UDKWJ) took place at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on March 3.
					 Present there were Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Kang Chu Ryon, its vice-chairwoman and chairwoman of the Union Central Standing Committee, Han Tong Song, director of the organization department of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, and members of the Union Central Committee.
					
					 Ho Jong Man in his speech noted that the Union has achieved great successes in rallying broad segments of Korean women in Japan including the rising generation behind the organization through the work celebrating its 70th founding anniversary last year.
					
					 He called for striving to significantly greet the 24th Congress of Chongryon and the 30th Congress of the Union.
					
					 Kang Chu Ryon in her report said that the Union has firmly carried forward the tradition of it, which had traversed the road of patriotism under the care of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, through an innovation movement conducted to greet the 70th anniversary of its formation.
					
					 She stressed the need to consolidate all successes achieved in the innovation movement by further strengthening each branch of the Union, calling for significantly greeting the 24th Congress of Chongryon and the 30th Congress of the Union with the pride of being an overseas women organization which inherited the glorious tradition of the Korean women's movement.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 The meeting decided to hold the 30th Congress of the Union at the Korean Hall on June 8.
					
					 A letter to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was read out there.

articles.title: Method of Enriching Rice Established
articles.content:
Method of Enriching Rice Established
Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- A method of enriching rice has been established by the Rice Institute under the Institute of Agricultural Science in the DPRK as part of the efforts to put farm work on a scientific basis.
					 It is regarded as superior high-yielding method which saves seeds, labor, water and farming materials by watering paddy fields at regular intervals and using organic fertilizers.
					
					 According to scientists, it helps enrich the root of rice and promote its overall growth while strengthening its resistance to unfavorable climate conditions and harmful insects.
					
					 This method has been applied to croplands in Pyongyang, Kangwon Province and other parts of the country, yielding over 10 tons per hectare.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Derides Senseless Act of Subject Nation Japan
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Derides Senseless Act of Subject Nation Japan
Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- Japan is going head-long into stifling the DPRK with the backing of its master U.S.
					 As soon as the U.S. announced "independent sanctions" on the DPRK in February, the Japanese reactionaries have gone reckless, voicing support for them and calling for the inspection of ships of the DPRK. This is just a typical example.
					
					 The frenzy of the islanders has reached the extreme as evidenced by their call for the convocation of an international conference for the inspection of DPRK-flagged ships which even the U.S. failed to conceive.
					
					 Japan, jeered by the world for its serious dependence on the U.S. and subjugation to it in the political, economic and military fields, is trying to take the lead in the moves to bring down the DPRK. This is enough to make a cat laugh as it is just a ridiculous act of a subject state.
					
					 In the past Japan tried to meet its interests by clinging to big powers only to suffer failure. This is not an exaggeration.
					
					 It stooped to any infamy to sign an unequal treaty to entrust its destiny to the U.S. in the middle of the 19th century and in the subsequent period, it curried favor with the Western powers, turning the whole country into market for selling the Western goods and a supply source of cheap raw materials only to push its economy into a slump.
					
					 At the connivance of the empires which put Japan under their political and economic control, Japan opted for overseas expansion only to get the ill-fame of a war defeated nation and a war criminal nation, in the face of strong rebuff of the world.
					
					 Such a country is now acting a poodle of a suzerain state, far from drawing a lesson from its shameful history. No wonder, it is destined to remain as a subject state.
					
					 The aim sought by Japan in going reckless, being lost to all shames, is to realize its old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere" at any cost. But Japan is mistaken.
					
					 Korea is not a weak nation as it used to be in the past when it was trampled under the jackboots of the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 The descendents of the Samurais are now suffering untold contempt and maltreatment such as political exclusion after being left in the cold and economic exploitation by the U.S. whom they worship. 
					
					 Under such situation Japan is trying to bring down the DPRK. This is as foolish an act as trying to pick up a star in the sky with a rotten noose.
					
					 A political scholar of Japan in his 2013 book that dealt with the theory of defeat in war commented that Japan will remain as a defeated nation forever if it fails to settle two factors -- "denial of defeat" and "subjugation toward the U.S."
					
					 Japan will face greater price to pay if it goes frivolous, being oblivious of its inglorious past and being unable to feel the change in the world political landscape.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Opening Road for Final Victory in Spirit of Mt Paektu
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Opening Road for Final Victory in Spirit of Mt Paektu
Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- An editorial of Rodong Sinmun Monday calls on all the people to get rallied close around respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and strikingly demonstrate the mightiness and invincibility of Juche Korea in the revolutionary spirit of Mt Paektu, the spirit of blizzards of Mt Paektu.
					 The revolutionary spirit of Mt Paektu, the spirit of blizzards of Mt Paektu is the strong offensive spirit of braving all difficulties and hardships and the staunch spirit of fighting back after succession of falls, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 It is the iron truth cherished in the course of the advancement of the DPRK shining with victory and glory that nothing will be un-surmountable if one lives in the revolutionary spirit of Mt Paektu, the spirit of blizzards of Mt Paektu.
					
					 Steadfast is the determination of the army and people of the DPRK to mercilessly meet the challenges of the hostile forces in the above-said spirit and to display to the full the dignity, might and invincibility of Juche Korea.
					
					 All the party members, service personnel and other people should fully display the revolutionary spirit of Mt Paektu, the spirit of blizzards of Mt Paektu in the on-going revolutionary general offensive for bringing the bright future of a powerful socialist country to this sacred land associated with the noble souls, breaths, blood and sweats of the anti-Japanese revolutionary forerunners.
					
					 Still far and difficult is the march of the Juche revolution that started in Mt Paektu, but firm is the faith of the army and people of the DPRK and bright is its future. The final victory is in store for Korea fighting in the revolutionary spirit of Mt Paektu, the spirit of blizzards of Mt Paektu.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts Japanese Reactionaries for Denying Past Crimes
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts Japanese Reactionaries for Denying Past Crimes
Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- A new video showing the thrice-cursed atrocities of the Japanese imperialists who slaughtered Korean sexual slaves in the past was recently made public in south Korea.
					 The video, stored at the U.S. National Archives, deals with the scene showing Japanese imperialist brutes cruelly killing the Korean women who were subjected to sexual slavery at the end of the Second World War. It shows a horrible sight of burnt, naked bodies which were thrown into a pit. Along with this video, an operation log of the allied forces was disclosed to show that Japanese imperialist aggression forces shot to death 30 Korean women who suffered from the sexual slavery on Sept. 13, 1944.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary says this once again proves that Japan is the sworn enemy of the Korean people as it committed thrice-cursed crimes against the Korean nation.
					
					 Nevertheless, the Japanese reactionaries try to justify the sexual slavery, far from acknowledging their history of crimes dotted with blood and making an apology and reparation. Not content with this, they lay bare their attempt for reinvasion, getting more frantic with revival of militarism with the backing of the U.S., the commentary says, adding:
					
					 The Japanese imperialists' hideous crimes against the Korean nation can never be pardoned, and if the Japanese reactionaries continue to deny their past crimes and behave imprudently, they will face a tragic end only.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Slovenia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Slovenia
Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- A Slovenian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed in Maribor City of Slovenia on February 21.
					 Igor Jurisic, chairman of the Slovenia-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize seminar, lecture, film show and other colorful political and cultural events praising the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Nepalese Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Nepalese Newspaper
Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Mangyongdae Revolutionary School Is the Training Centre of the Backbone That Will Succeed to the Juche Blood" was carried on the March 2nd issue of the Nepalese newspaper Arpan.
					 It was illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held
Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- There were seminars on exploits of leader Kim Jong Il in Bulgaria, Serbia, Egypt, Uganda and Mexico on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 Present there were political and social personages and masses in those countries.
					
					 The chief of the Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said Kim Jong Il was not only the great leader of the Korean people but also the prominent leader of the world progressives.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt noted Kim Jong Il firmly defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country, global peace and security and brought about a radical turn in the building of a powerful socialist nation with his unique Songun politics.
					
					 Speakers at the seminar in Uganda said Kim Jong Il's life was dedicated to the victorious advance of the cause of socialism in the DPRK, adding the progressive mankind is highly praising the undying exploits he performed for the times and history.
					
					 Personages of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism praised him for his ideological and theoretical exploits and Songun leadership exploits which will shine forever.

articles.title: Parte de Pyongyang delegacion de Fiscalia Central hacia Cuba
articles.content:
Parte de Pyongyang delegacion de Fiscalia Central hacia Cuba
Pyongyang, 12 de marzo (ACNC) -- La delegacion de la Fiscalia Central de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, encabezada por el director Kim Myong Gil, partio el dia 12 de esta capital hacia Cuba.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia alimentos de cumpleanos a los intelectuales ameritados
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia alimentos de cumpleanos a los intelectuales ameritados
Pyongyang, 12 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un envio alimentos de cumpleanos a Han Um Jon, investigadora del Instituto de Estudio de los Asuntos Internacionales y al candidato al Academico, Profesor y Doctor Titulares Ri Yong Su, investigador de la Universidad de Agricultura de Wonsan, quienes acogen el septuagesimo cumpleanos.
					En marzo del 37 (1948) de la Era Juche, el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il hizo regresar a la patria socialista a Han, nacida en la tierra extranjera, y le dispensaron benevolencias.
					
					Continuando el amor de los grandes lideres, el Maximo Dirigente le hizo trabajar en el puesto de la revolucion para que ella pudiera llevar adelante el espiritu nacional y patriotico.
					
					Hasta la fecha, Ri Yong Su contribuye al desarrollo de la agricultura del pais y la formacion de los intelectuales agricolas dedicando su inteligencia y entusiasmo a la educacion y la investigacion cientifica.
					
					Trabajando como profesor e investigador durante largo tiempo despues de su graduacion, el escribio manuales y libros de referencia de decenas de generos y mas de 100 tesis cientificas y formo a muchos poseedores de titulos academicos y grados docentes.
					
					Han y Ri recibieron el diploma de honor del Presidente y reloj con su nombre y participaron en el VI Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y otros conclaves.

articles.title: Efectuada Reunion Nacional de Activistas de Brigadas y Cuadrillas Juveniles del Campo
articles.content:
Efectuada Reunion Nacional de Activistas de Brigadas y Cuadrillas Juveniles del Campo
Pyongyang, 12 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 12 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la Reunion Nacional de Activistas de Brigadas y Cuadrillas Juveniles del Campo.
					Asistieron al conclave Ko In Ho, vicepremier y ministro de Agricultura, Ri Il Hwan, jefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, los funcionarios interesados y de la Union de la Juventud y los jovenes ejemplares en el movimiento de las brigadas y cuadrillas juveniles de las zonas rurales.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del primer secretario del CC de la Union de la Juventud Kimilsungista-Kimjongilista, Pak Chol Min.
					
					El dijo que por la iniciativa y bajo la sabia direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, el movimiento de brigadas y cuadrillas juveniles del campo se convirtio en el masivo en las labores por construir una potencia economica y mejorar las condiciones de la vida popular enarbolando la tesis rural socialista.
					
					Recordo que en el pasado los miembros de esas unidades de trabajo manifestaron patentemente el impetu heroico y poderio invencible de vanguardia juvenil en la produccion agricola.
					
					En el fragor del movimiento de brigadas y cuadrillas juveniles, mas de mil 400 obtuvieron el honor de las ejemplares y muchas de estas lo ganaron dos y hasta 3 veces, subrayo.
					
					Exhorto a todos los integrantes de brigadas y cuadrillas a poner de pleno manifiesto el temperamento de vanguardia juvenil en la campana para materializar la tesis rural socialista.
					
					En la reunion hubo intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores mencionaron que en la lucha por materializar el proyecto del partido sobre la construccion del campo socialista, los miembros de brigadas y cuadrillas juveniles a lo largo del pais crecieron como pilares del campo socialista y revolucionarios jovenes.
					
					Durante sus alocuciones, quedaron analizados y balanceados los defectos y lecciones de no haber desarrollado de manera revolucionaria el movimiento en cuestion conforme al proposito del partido y la demanda de la revolucion en desarrollo.

articles.title: ACNC comenta la participacion activa de Japon en la campana de sancion anti-RPDC
articles.content:
ACNC comenta la participacion activa de Japon en la campana de sancion anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 12 de marzo (ACNC) -- Japon toma parte activa en la campana de aplastamiento anti-RPDC con el respaldo de su amo gringo.
					Por ejemplo, tan pronto como EE.UU. publicara en el mes pasado la "sancion independiente" anti-RPDC, los reaccionarios japoneses arman un tumulto expresando el apoyo y hablando de la vigilancia de barcos.
					
					La obsesion del clan de samurais llega a tal grado que reclama la convocacion de una reunion internacional sobre la vigilancia de embarcaciones norcoreanas, la cual no se le ha ocurrido ni a EE.UU.
					
					Resulta muy ridiculo el papel de abanderado de Japon en la campana anticoreana si se toma en cuenta que este pais es ridiculizado en el mundo por la dependencia y subyugacion a EE.UU. en el plano politico, el economico y el militar.
					
					No seria exagerado si se dice que el pasado de Japon fue el tiempo en que el se arruinaba debido a su intento de sacar provechos de la vida dependiente de las potencias.
					
					A mediados del siglo 19, decidio confiar su destino en EE.UU. y no vacilo en firmar con este un tratado desigual.
					
					Seguidamente, depaupero la economia nacional al convertir todo el pais en un mercado de mercancias del Occidente y el abastecedor de materias primas baratas con gestos halaguenos a las potencias occidentales.
					
					Bajo la tolerancia de los imperios que subyugaron a Japon en lo politico y lo economico, el pais isla emprendio el camino de expansion a ultramar y resulto derrotado ante el contraataque del mundo ganandose la deshonra de pais criminal de guerra.
					
					Su proposito esta en realizar a toda costa su antiguo sueno de la "Esfera de coprosperidad de la gran Asia Oriental".
					
					Pero, Japon esta equivocado.
					
					La RPDC no es pais debil de ayer que estuvo bajo las botas del imperialismo japones.
					
					En contraste, los descendientes de samurais sufren ahora el repudio politico y la explotacion economica de su amo gringo.
					
					Un politologo japones senalo en 2013 en su libro sobre la teoria de derrotas que Japon estara siempre en el estado de derrotado si no se libera de dos elementos: "la negacion de la derrota en la guerra" y "la dependencia de EE.UU.".
					
					Japon pagara mas caro sus crimenes si anda olvidando su historia vergonzosa sin percibir el cambio de la estructura politica mundial.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena a los reaccionarios japoneses que niegan su crimen del pasado
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena a los reaccionarios japoneses que niegan su crimen del pasado
Pyongyang, 12 de marzo (ACNC) -- Recientemente, fue publicado en el Sur de Corea el nuevo video sobre las atrocidades de los imperialistas japoneses que en el pasado asesinaron cruelmente a las esclavas sexuales coreanas.
					Este video, que habia conservado en el Archivo Nacional de EE.UU., muestra el terreno en que a finales de la Segunda Guerra Mundial los imperialistas japonesas asesinaron cruelmente a las mujeres coreanas quienes fueron obligadas a la vida de esclava sexual. El film refleja los cadaveres de las coreanas desnudas y quemadas que estan lanzadas en el hoyo. Ademas, fue publicado un diario operacional de las fuerzas aliadas, segun el cual el ejercito agresor de Japon fusilo el 13 de septiembre de 1944 a las 30 esclavas sexuales coreanas.
					
					Este hecho demuestra claramente que Japon es el enemigo jurado que cometio intolerables crimenes atroces contra la nacion coreana. Senalo asi el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 12 y continuo:
					
					Pero, en vez de reconocer su historia criminal y hacer disculpas e indemnizacion por el respecto, los reaccionarios japoneses estan justificando sus crimenes de esclavitud sexual y exponen abiertamente el intento de reagredir entregandose mas al resurgimiento del militarismo bajo el amparo de EE.UU.
					
					Jamas seran perdonados los crimenes de los imperialistas japoneses cometidos a la nacion coreana. 
					
					Si los reaccionarios japoneses siguen negando sus delitos del pasado mereceran solo el destino tragico.
